snippet: The rite lets priests who have the approval of their bishops bestow the church’s blessing on gay couples, no matter whether their state allows the marriage or not.
abstract: Episcopal Church approves an official liturgy for blessing same-sex unions, enabling priests who have the approval of their bishops to bestow the church’s blessing on gay couples, no matter whether their state allows the marriage or not.
